description: A simple chat with a custom prompt template and conversational memory buffer
name: One Group

openai_api_base_ChatOpenAI-WlIXw.name: openai_api_base
openai_api_base_ChatOpenAI-WlIXw.info:
The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.

You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem.

input_key_ConversationBufferMemory-WkJkh.name: input_key
input_key_ConversationBufferMemory-WkJkh.info: The variable to be used as Chat Input when more than one variable is available.

output_key_ConversationBufferMemory-WkJk.name: output_key
output_key_ConversationBufferMemory-WkJk.info: The variable to be used as Chat Output (e.g. answer in a ConversationalRetrievalChain)

template_PromptTemplate-h1IlH.name: template
